title: Tom Brady and Gisele Bundchen cut $5million from price of their Boston mansion and re-list for $34M
text:
Advertisement

They're looking to unload a bit of real estate in a stealthy sale.

But Tom Brady and Gisele Bundchen can't seem to get rid of their Boston-area mansion quick enough as they cut a staggering $5million from the price tag of their five-bedroom home.

The 42-year-old legendary football player and his world-famous supermodel wife initially listed the home on the market for $39.5million in August, but have reduced the price down to $33.9million.

Impressive: Tom Brady and Gisele Bundchen can't seem to get rid of their Boston-area mansion quick enough as they cut a staggering $5million from the price tag of their five-bedroom home

The 9,716-square-foot home was designed by Richard Landry and sits across five acres in the ritzy Brookline area of Massachusetts.

Built in 2015, a cobblestone driveway leads to the five-bedroom, seven-bath home, with lush landscaping and a sprawling green lawn surrounding the property.

A grand foyer welcomes guests inside, with high ceilings and floor-to-ceiling windows providing ample lighting throughout the two-story abode.

Wow! The 42-year-old legendary football player and his world-famous supermodel wife initially listed the home on the market for $39.5million in August, but have reduced the price down to $33.9million

Let's eat! If one massive, eat-in kitchen with a large island just isn't enough spice for your palate, a chef's kitchen is located nearby with wooden ceiling beams and copper accents

Views for days: A grand foyer welcomes guests inside, with high ceilings and floor-to-ceiling windows providing ample lighting throughout the two-story abode

If one massive, eat-in kitchen with a large island just isn't enough spice for your palate, a chef's kitchen is located nearby with wooden ceiling beams and copper accents.

The lower level of the impressive home includes a kids' playroom, a wine room, recreation room, gym and spa.

Outdoor amenities include a tiled, in-ground pool, and an organic herb and vegetable garden.

Take a swim! Outdoor amenities include a tiled, in-ground pool, and an organic herb and vegetable garden

Gorgeous: While the main home is a standout in itself, a 2,400-square-foot guest house is situated in the backyard which includes a yoga studio, a full bathroom and sleeping loft

While the main home is a standout in itself, a 2,400-square-foot guest house is situated in the backyard which includes a yoga studio, a full bathroom and sleeping loft.

Tom and Gisele likely won't travel too far as he recently signed a contract to extend his role for another three years as the starting quarterback for the New England Patriots.

The six-time Super Bowl winning champ — the most of any player in the NFL — will make $23million for playing with the team in 2019, with $52million more ahead for the following two seasons.
description: The 42-year-old legendary football player and his world-famous supermodel wife initially listed the home on the market for $39.5million in August, but have reduced the price down to $33.9million.
